Defines class TemplateDir with attribute(s) and method(s). Defines project template directory container.

class ats_utilities.pro_config.template_dir.TemplateDir(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class TemplateDir with attribute(s) and method(s). Defines project template directory container. Mechanism for project configuration.

It defines:

attributes:

methods:
